House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to abolish the Federal Open Market Committee.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to abolish the Federal Open Market Committee. Declares that no Federal Reserve bank shall engage or decline to engage in open-market operations under such Act except in accordance with the direction of regulations adopted by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System. Requires the Board of Governors to consider, adopt, and transmit regulations to the several Federal Reserve banks relating to the open-market transactions of such Federal Reserve banks.

titles.title: A bill to abolish the Federal Open Market Committee.
